2083300.name: Fantasy Grounds - D&D Starter Set: Dragons of Stormwreck Isle
2083300.description:
D&D Starter Set: Dragons of Stormwreck Isle

The

Dungeons & Dragons
(R)
Starter Set: Dragons of Stormwreck Isle (TM) is your gateway to action-packed adventures in the cooperative storytelling game
Dungeons & Dragons, where heroes battle monsters, find treasure, and undertake epic quests. This box contains the essential rules of the game plus everything you need to play heroic characters caught up in an ancient war among dragons as they explore the secrets of Stormwreck Isle.
 
THIS SET INCLUDES:
  • Adapted from the 48-page adventure book with everything you need to get started
  • Adapted from the 32-page rulebook for playing characters of levels 1-3
  • 5 pregenerated characters
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Zacchaeus
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included D&D fifth edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
